message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.IT. 

The paper proposes a novel robust graph learning scheme for clustering, semisupervised learning, and data recovery tasks. The proposed model is based on manifold regularized robust PCA and exploits the graph smoothness assumption and clean data recovered by robust PCA. The experiments are conducted on image/document clustering, object recognition, image shadow removal, and video background subtraction, indicating that the paper is likely to belong to the following arXiv CS sub-categories: 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning)
- cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition)
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms)
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence)
- cs.IT (Information Theory)
